channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock markets fall after US tariffs spark trade war fears
item.description: Stock markets in the US, Asia and the UK dip after Trump tariffs kicked in and spark retaliation.

item.title: Dolly Parton says Carl Dean, her husband of 60 years, has died
item.description: Carl Dean, the husband of Dolly Parton, died Monday in Nashville, the singer said in a statement.

item.title: Gazans face tough choices as their future is debated on the global stage
item.description: Their fate is the discussion of Arab leaders in Egypt but what do Gazans want for their future?

item.title: What pause in US military aid could mean for Ukraine
item.description: It's a bitter blow for Ukraine and Europe - but not the first time the US has withheld aid, writes BBC's Jonathan Beale.

item.title: How to watch Trump's address to Congress tonight
item.description: President Trump will address a joint session of Congress tonight, marking his first speech to both chambers since he returned to office. Here's how to...

item.title: Tariffs have businesses bracing for change in Trump country
item.description: President Trump's tariff policy is creating uncertainty for places like Tupelo, Miss. with a manufacturing-dependent economy. It's in a conservative c...

item.title: Texas measles outbreak fueled by distrust in public health and personal choice
Storms and possible twisters threaten the South just as New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras
item.description: Powerful storms bearing a threat of tornadoes are expected to punch through Louisiana and other parts of the South on Tuesday.

item.title: One-year-olds among those raped during Sudan civil war, UN says
item.description: Children as young as one have been subjected to horrific sexual violence, a UN report finds.

item.title: Ukraine's shock over US military aid pause
item.description: One Ukrainian politician urged Trump "not to play with these dangerous issues because we're talking about lives".

item.title: Trump is asserting extraordinary power over independent agencies. Is the Fed next?
item.description: The rise and potential fall of independent agencies.

item.title: Journalist killed in Mexico, at least the 3rd such murder this year
item.description: For years, Mexico has been one of the world's most dangerous countries outside a war zone for journalists.

item.title: Swing state Sen. Elissa Slotkin to deliver rebuttal to Trump's speech to Congress
item.description: Michigan's first-term senator, Slotkin — a centrist with deep national security credentials — will deliver the Democrats' rebuttal to President Trump'...

item.title: Rural schools in Alaska are crumbling. The state is the likely culprit
item.description: Rural school districts depend on the state to fund construction and maintenance projects. But over the past 25 years, Alaska lawmakers have ignored hu...

item.title: As Trump shrinks other parts of government, immigration task forces grow
item.description: The Trump administration is tapping several other agencies to help deport and arrest those without legal status — a novel step that is prompting some ...

item.title: Trump administration pauses U.S. military aid to Ukraine
item.description: The U.S. has been a key supplier of weapons for Ukraine as it continues to fend off the invasion launched by Russia three years ago.

item.title: Trump to stand before Congress and offer divided nation an accounting of his turbulent first weeks
"Chappy," Baby seal found stranded on street near Yale dies
item.description: "Chappy," a baby seal found stranded on a street near Yale University, has died from severe digestive issues, a local aquarium says.
